name: Santa VS Krampus (blatalzar, superbat3d)
description:
Santa is trying to Give a present to the children, but the house is infested by Krampus and his minions! Help him get to the bottom of the chimney as fast as possible.

If you hit a monster you will be slowed! You have to hit the SAME MONSTER to get yourself free. Be carreful: some monsters look alike!

Good luck!
